programme.title: Jutro na Banovini
programme.desc: Vaš dinamičan početak dana uz naš dinamičan program! Donosimo servisne informacije o vremenu, stanju na cestama te dnevne aktualnosti u zemlji, svijetu i na našem lokalnom području.

programme.title: Vijesti
programme.desc: Pregled najnovijih i najpopularnijih, lokalnih vijesti.

programme.title: Oglasi Radio Banovine
programme.desc: Nijedna tržnica svijeta nam nije ravna, kad uključimo pozive, ili počnemo čitati male oglase, doslovno, kako se kaže, u malim oglasima RB – a možete pronaći sve, od igle do lokomotive, pa i više.

programme.title: Muzički miks
programme.desc: Muzičke premijere, najnoviji hitovi Grand produkcije i muzika za sva vremena u izvođenju najvećih zvezda narodne muzike. Miks spotova, snimaka sa koncerata, uživo izvođenja i plejbekova iz emisija.

programme.title: TV prodaja - Biostile
programme.desc: U našoj TV trgovini otkrijte bogatu ponudu proizvoda marke Biostile, uz koje ćete poboljšati svoje zdravlje i ojačati svoj imunitet.

programme.title: Muzički miks
programme.desc: Muzičke premijere, najnoviji hitovi Grand produkcije i muzika za sva vremena u izvođenju najvećih zvezda narodne muzike. Miks spotova, snimaka sa koncerata, uživo izvođenja i plejbekova iz emisija.

programme.title: Zvezde Granda - Specijal
programme.desc: Saša Popović kao i svake godine spremio je iznenađenja za gledatelje kraj malih ekrana, pa je tako u ovu popularnu emisiju riješio da uvede neke novine. Od ove sezone i gostima će sigurno biti zabavnije obzirom da će se u ekipama takmičiti u kvizu u kojem će odgovarajući na razna šaljiva pitanja skupljati poene i boriti se za pobjedu. Pored raznih zamiljivih anketa i smiješnih skečeva ono što je ostalo nepromijenjeno jeste dobra muzika i odlična atmosfera.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: It's Robbie's birthday and everyone has come to celebrate with him - Toto, Dolly, the ducks, Horse, Elephant and Cow. Come join the celebration as they all sing him a birthday song, eat cake and enjoy his gift.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: │ Epizoda: 3 │ When we meet somebody everywhere we go, we say hello. Hallo, namaste, annyeonghaseyo - "Hello" has different names - in German, Hindi or Korean. Let's greet our friends from all around the world with a nice hello in their language.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: In this fun and popular counting rhyme for kids, the five little hungry mice are climbing a pot of rice to have a yummy feast.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Charlie, Lola and all their animal friends come together in this fun and humorous rendition of The Farmer in the Dell.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Little Lola has fun staying home playing with her pets. She throws her dog a stick and gives some milk to her cat. Pets are fun.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: "One, two, buckle my shoe; Three, four, shut the door…" Counting is the best! Let's join Charlie & the Numbers in this popular and cheerful song and count from one to ten.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Lola, Charlie and Henry are baking a delicous cake together. Come find out what you need in order to make the perfect cake.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Mother Duck goes out with her five little ducklings. Each one is fascinated by something along the way. Luckily, they all find their way back in the end.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Charlie has fun in the Bath! Join him as he washes his hair, scrubs himself with soap, makes bubbles and plays with his rubber duck. When he's nice and clean he puts on his pajamas and goes to bed. Good night Charlie.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Billy and Bam have fun watching the bears make food together. Sometimes things don't go quite as expected but that's part of the fun.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Squirrel is sleeping soundly when the fairy Ki takes him on a magical journey in the sky. Join them as they float through the stars and the moon.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Toto, Robbie and Dolly are all busy baking a cake! After pouring all the ingredients in the pan Robbie uses his hand as a whip to whip them all up. Come see as they take the cake out of the oven and top it with sprinkles.

programme.title: Moonlight
programme.desc: Calming visuals of abstract objects and nature, accompanied by soothing music for night time programming.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Daddy Hippo peacefully puts baby Hippo to Bed with this relaxing tune that is sure to get everyone sleepy.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Do you like the sun? All the children want to play with Mr. Golden Sun. Let's ask him to shine down and play with us.

programme.title: Magic Stars
programme.desc: Let's slow down and change gears.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Join Little Lola, papa, and farm friends in this cheery BabyTV version of the famous rhyme, Johhny Johnny Yes Papa. Papa offers Lola healthy veggies and dessert instead of catching her eating sugar.

programme.title: Let's Dance
programme.desc: │ Epizoda: 7 │ Get off your couch and start to move! Kids will love to dance and move to energetic music while interacting with animated characters. Come join the beat.

programme.title: Draco
programme.desc: On your marks, get set, go! Join Draco as he learns opposites "slow" and "fast" while playing catch and racing against a toy rabbit and a toy tortoise, understanding that he can run slower than the rabbit but faster than the tortoise.

programme.title: Stitches
programme.desc: Needles, Bouncy and Florence learn how to play Land and Sea with a hula hoop. Come see them twirl the hula hoop on their hips and their hands. They even sing a hula hoop song.

programme.title: Maya and Yaya
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 1 ││ Epizoda: 3 │ Maya opens a new hair salon and invites Yaya to get a new hairstyle. Maya shampoos, washes, rinses, washes and blow dries Yaya's hair but Yaya doesn't like it! Join the two cute elephants to see how Maya ends up with a new hairstyle and how Yaya learns to like his new look as well.

programme.title: By the Lake
programme.desc: Your kids will love to relax with BabyTV's characters in a beautiful park with soothing classical music.

programme.title: Magic World
programme.desc: "Magic World" is a captivating children's program on Baby TV, combining fun and education in every episode. The series showcases delightful animated characters who explore an enchanting realm filled with mythical creatures. Throughout their adventures, young viewers gain essential life lessons, stimulate their imaginations, and learn basic concepts like colors, shapes, and numbers. With its lively music, interactive segments, and engaging narratives, "Magic World" is crafted to entertain and educate the youngest audience, providing a safe and enriching environment for kids to discover and enjoy new experiences.

programme.title: Peek-a-boo with friends
programme.desc: │ Epizoda: 9 │ Your kids will love to relax with BabyTV's characters in a beautiful park with soothing classical music.

programme.title: Playing in the Park
programme.desc: │ Epizoda: 8 │ Your kids will love to relax with BabyTV's characters in a beautiful park with soothing classical music.

programme.title: Charlie & the Alphabet
programme.desc: The adventures of a funny and mischievous egg. E gets upset when the egg he tries to paint runs off. Charlie and E go searching for the egg; they're in for a big surprise.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Billy and Bam Bam continue to play pretend and have fun singing the classic rhyme Miss Polly had a Dolly and treat Billy's doll who is sick.

programme.title: Mini Matinee
programme.desc: Join the loveable animal friends as they visit Canada. The friends want to eat pancakes but have no peanut butter! Find out the forest guard's secret about maple trees and taste sweet maple syrup.

programme.title: Beep Beep
programme.desc: Trucky, Roady and Voom Vam want to go to the lake to have a picnic. After wandering around for quite some time, they realize they have no clue how to get to the lake. Everyone is on edge until a beautiful butterfly saves the day.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Old King Cole was a merry old soul, and a merry old soul was he. Join Old King Cole and his three fiddlers in this merry folk nursery rhyme.

programme.title: Travelers
programme.desc: Harley and Perry play football together. Perry turns out to be quite a talented player. When it's Harley's turn, she's not as succesful. Will she score a goal in the end.

programme.title: Walter and Dude
programme.desc: Walter and Dude are looking for an item that blows air, turns around and cools you down. Is it a spinning top, a hairdryer, or an ice lolly? Join them as they discover it's a fan.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Lola has fun with all your favorite characters from the Tiny Bunch. Come join them as they sing the favorite classic "This Old Man".

programme.title: Olly
programme.desc: Kitty's garden has gotten out of hand! Olly the gardener has fun mowing the grass and pretending to be a scarecrow.

programme.title: Bug'n'Play to the Rescue
programme.desc: What a pleasant surprise - there's a rubber duck in the yard! Butterson finds himself stranded in the middle of a puddle on the fubber duck. Luckily, Hop has an idea how to save the day.

programme.title: Happy Birthday To You
programme.desc: Make your child a star on BabyTV by creating their very own personalized birthday greeting. Using a digital photo, parents can create a clip for their child which can be viewed online or submitted to BabyTV for the chance of being featured on-air.

programme.title: Cuddlies
programme.desc: Tickles wants to form a musical band with his friends and composes a tune for them to play. The friends joke around and Yum Yum even eats food with the drumsticks, so Tickles gets a bit upset. Join the friends as they cheer him up, play music and enjoy a lovely musical day.

programme.title: Bath Tubbies
programme.desc: Ducky, Ellie and Froggy are having fun sailing on a raft! The sun is tired and so are the friends that head back home! What's the round and white reflection in the water? It's the moon! Join the friends as they play and dance with the moon along with his sparkling stars.

programme.title: Jump Out of Bed Sleepy Head
programme.desc: │ Epizoda: 3 │ Let's solve some riddles, play some games and wake up the castle! Jump out of bed everyone.

programme.title: Egg Band
programme.desc: Five little ducks went swimming one day - where did they go? Come sing along to this all-time favorite.

programme.title: The World is a Wonder
programme.desc: Join Gaya the Fairy as she dives deep into the sea and discovers the life of the seahorse and how seahorses reproduce and create a beautiful family.

programme.title: Zeina's Detective Agency
programme.desc: A planter arrives at Zeina's doorstep, forgetting what it is used for. Using her detective skill and her best friend Roy, Zeina discovers that a planter is used for sailing... is it.

programme.title: Welcome to the Island
programme.desc: The four friends on the island are unpleasantly surprised when two octopuses begin littering the island. Just when it seems they can't reconcile their differences, they come up with a creative solution.

programme.title: Teeny and Tiny's Classroom
programme.desc: │ Epizoda: 2 │ It's time to play fun games with Teeny and Tiny. Join mischievous friends as they learn colors, numbers, sizes, and shapes.

programme.title: Mike's Bikes
programme.desc: Bunny is going to sleep over at Petite's house! But how is she going to carry all her toys with her and ride her bike? Mikey has all the answers of course.

programme.title: Stick with Mick
programme.desc: Mick is going for a ride on his new bicycle. Join Mick as he puts his cute monkey in the bike basket! Come along and help Mick wear his helmet and ring the bicycle bell so the turtle can move out of the way! Grab a water bottle and join the fun ride.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Everyone shares in the fun when singing Ten Green Bottles. Baby, Hippo, Elephant, Turtle, Sheep, Rabbit, Squirrel and Giraffe all manage to knock off one of the bottles until there are no bottles left.

programme.title: Crafty Rafty
programme.desc: Come along and have lots of fun with socks! Discover the amazing undersea world! Swim with sock fish among colourful sock coral reefs! Enjoy the small fish made of clothespins and blow button bubbles! Join Crafty Rafty as he creates a crab from a sock with button eyes and pin claws.

programme.title: Billy Bam Bam
programme.desc: Billy and BamBam enjoy playing hide and seek with their dolls. Come hop along and have fun with them as they pretend to be jumping kangaroos with baby kangaroos inside their pockets.

programme.title: Jungle Book
programme.desc: Everyone has their own special talent, and today you're going to meet the best talents in the jungle - Leela, Gray, Adhira, and Indra... but what about Mowgli? What's his special talent.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Lola, Charlie and Henry are baking a delicous cake together. Come find out what you need in order to make the perfect cake.

programme.title: Look What I Found
programme.desc: The friends have fun discovering a broom! Come along as the broom turns into a happy stick-horse! Giddy up among lovely mountains and trees! Cross over a river and a cool waterfall! See the stick-horse as he reunites with his amazing family.

programme.title: Maya and Yaya
programme.desc: Maya and Yaya are at the beach. Maya goes in the water but Yaya is a bit scared, so he tries using a life saver, goggles, a snorkel and fins, but is still reluctant to go in. Join the two cute elephants to see what finally helps Yaya jump in the water! Come along and have lots of fun with Maya, Yaya and the colourful fish.

programme.title: Snowies fun and frosty guessing games
programme.desc: Come play a cool guessing game in the snow with the adorable snowies! Guess which animal makes a whistling sound! Is it a cow or a seal? Join the cute snowman friends and have lots of fun as they create a wonderful whale.

programme.title: Egg Band
programme.desc: What do the animals wear on the farm? Come find out in this funny rendition of "The Wheels on the Bus" where cows wear gowns, horses wear boots and hens wear scarves.

programme.title: Pix & Leo
programme.desc: Pix and Leo want to get to the fruit across the river. They notice Beaver busy building his dam. Can Beaver help them cross the river and get to the yummy fruit.

programme.title: My Robot & I
programme.desc: Kim and Kit are decorating the yard with streamers and balloons for a birthday party! Kit doesn't know it's actually HIS birthday! Turns out - robots love surprises.

programme.title: Ahoy Pirates
programme.desc: │ Epizoda: 1 │ Ahoy everyone! Are you ready for an adventure? Come join Captain Kaite, Jon Jon and Beth as they set sail to find the treasure.

programme.title: Walter and Dude
programme.desc: Walter and Dude the Dog are looking for an item that is yellow, cute, and squeaks. Is it a banana, a toy car, or perhaps Walter himself? Join the two friends as they discover it's a rubber duckie bath toy.

programme.title: Tutti Frutti
programme.desc: Tutti and Frutti put on a spectacular show for all their friends with a great performance in a wonderful marching parade.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Elephant, Giraffe, Sheep and Baby wash, iron and mend their clothes, sweep and scrub the floor and bake bread. And then they all go round the mulberry bush on a cold and frosty morning.

programme.title: Welcome to the Island
programme.desc: It's the annual fish jumping contest and everyone wants to know who will jump the most amazing jump and win the star medal.

programme.title: Big Bugs Band
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 1 ││ Epizoda: 4 │ Join the Big Bugs Band on their journey to the wonderful world of Rock 'n' Roll as they have fun playing various musical instruments including an organ. Come and enjoy as the bugs sing and dance before a cheering audience of fellow animals in the woods.

programme.title: Travelers
programme.desc: Two very different and funny travelers, the level-headed Perry and the mischievous Harley, discover that there is more than one way to solve a problem.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: │ Epizoda: 3 │ When we meet somebody everywhere we go, we say hello. Hallo, namaste, annyeonghaseyo - "Hello" has different names - in German, Hindi or Korean. Let's greet our friends from all around the world with a nice hello in their language.

programme.title: Charlie & the Numbers
programme.desc: On their way to find Princess Number Two's crown, she and Charlie encounter various "two" objects including clowns and clouds. After Charlie makes her a crown of flowers, the original crown is found and the two friends set out to the Numbers Party.

programme.title: Teeny and Tiny's Classroom
programme.desc: Teeny and Tiny try to figure out what is hiding underneath the handkerchief. What can it be? Come join them as they solve riddles and play games.

programme.title: Giggle Wiggle
programme.desc: Joe the monkey loves to monkey around. Come join him in the jungle and follow in his steps - clap your hands, stomp your feet and scratch your head.

programme.title: Snail Trail
programme.desc: Mr. Snail meets another snail that's missing his shell! Snails need shells to protect them from drying up! Bird used the shell to build a nest and now she's happy to give it back.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: What's more fun than eating cakes and breads? Eating them with your favorite BabyTV characters - Hungry Henry, Billy and Bam Bam, Draco and Oliver.

programme.title: Happy Birthday To You
programme.desc: Make your child a star on BabyTV by creating their very own personalized birthday greeting. Using a digital photo, parents can create a clip for their child which can be viewed online or submitted to BabyTV for the chance of being featured on-air.

programme.title: Bug'n'Play to the Rescue
programme.desc: Someone is having a birthday party and the bugs are all excited! But a strong gust of wind leaves Hop stranded on a balloon. Laz and Butterson find a clever way of helping him out.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Join Sheep the farmer as he sows and waters the seeds, hoes the weeds and harvests the seeds. Giraffe, Hippo and Rabbit join him in a fun dance.

programme.title: Zeina's Detective Agency
programme.desc: A highly familiar day-to-day object arrives at Zeina's doorstep forgetting what it is used for. Searching for the answer, Zeina and her best friend Roy come up with a new and hilarious use for the surprised object. While they all have a great time with its new use, the object's true use is revealed to them.

programme.title: Billy Bam Bam
programme.desc: Billy and BamBam enjoy playing with their race horses galloping over grass, a mountain and sand. Join them as they use building blocks and sticks to create a game of limbo! So how low can you go.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Baby butterfly picks roses and meets friends along the way - Hippo, Elephant, Turtle and more. Careful not to sneeze.

programme.title: Look What I Found
programme.desc: The friends water a small plant as it becomes huge, and by sitting on the leaves, you can see the view of the city. By watering it more, the plant grows more until it reaches the clouds.

programme.title: Snowies fun and frosty guessing games
programme.desc: Snowies fun and frosty guessing games.

programme.title: Charlie & the Shapes
programme.desc: The Queen of Hearts wants a star on her magic wand to take to the shapes party. She has her heart set on Princess star. When she realizes you can't take down stars from the sky her loyal helper Zigzag comes to the rescue.

programme.title: Cuddlies
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 1 ││ Epizoda: 2 │ It is time for bed and everyone is getting ready to go to sleep. Tickles plays a lullaby, Yum Yum prepares a sandwich and Dodo falls asleep. Uh Oh fills up his bed with items so as not to be alone, but it breaks due to overload. Join Uh Oh and his friends as they cheer him up by sleeping over and enjoy a nice pillow fight.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes

programme.title: Mike's Bikes

programme.title: Pix & Leo
programme.desc: Hey! A coconut just fell from the tree. It's fun to play with a coconut. Catch, Leo! Catch, Pix! But who will get it first.

programme.title: Olly
programme.desc: Arrrgg matey! Make way for Olly the pirate. Olly and his friends are on an exciting adventure to find the treasure.

programme.title: Beep Beep
programme.desc: Voom Vam goes to the beach by herself and gets stuck in the sand. Roady and Trucky come to the rescue and manage to pull her out. All's well that ends well as the three have fun at the beach together.

programme.title: Crafty Rafty
programme.desc: Come along and sail the high seas! Meet a cute dog, an adorable dolphin and fabulous fish on your exciting journey! Join Crafty Rafty as he creates an amazing bird using wood, pinecones, logs, nuts and a stick.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Elephant, Giraffe and Rabbit sure know some moves. Join them as they count and dance.

programme.desc: Billy and Bam play with a balloon. When the balloon flies off the siblings run after it. Will they be able to get their balloon back.

programme.desc: Join the loveable animal friends as they visit Monaco. What happens when the driver can't find Monaco? Discover the Princesses' solution! A pole with a flag! What colour will the flag be? Come and see.

programme.title: Egg Band
programme.desc: The Egg Band in their version of the classic nursery rhyme - The Finger Family. Come join the family and sing along.

programme.title: The World is a Wonder
programme.desc: Join Gaya the Fairy as she explores the tropical forest, flowers, and banana trees - how bananas grow into small and green bunches, changing into ripe bananas for the monkeys to eat.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Little Cabin in the Woods is a popular and fun song that teaches toddlers and young children colors and shapes with yummy fruits. Join Baby TV's friends as they have fun learning and eating a strawberry, a banana, a plum, and an apple together.

programme.title: Play & Learn with the Post Train
programme.desc: Join Fast Frank as he rushes off to deliver a package for Henry the Hippo from Ellie the Elephant! Hop on the train and help find Henry! Enjoy the meadow and snowy valley on the way! Come find Henry in the warm Savanna filled with water and grass! Discover what's inside the package! A towel.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Bam Bam wants to do everything Billy does - but it's not always easy! Join the cutest sibling duo as they try to whistle, bounce a basketball and rub their tummy while rubbing their head. Remember - practice makes perfect.

programme.title: Jungle Book
programme.desc: The jungle has a lot of surprises. Today the students learn how to move without anyone seeing them with the best and sneakiest teacher ever - Kaa.

programme.title: Ahoy Pirates
programme.desc: │ Epizoda: 1 │ Join Captain Katie, Jon Jon, Beth and their faithful monkey Ari as they set sail on an adventure to find the pirate treasure. There will be animals, obstacles, puzzles and parties along the way.

programme.title: What a Wonderful Day
programme.desc: It's afternoon! Join the fun and play in the playground! Watch the robin and lark as they clean their lovely nest! Dream on the grass and have a fine rest! Come along, feel free to be happy - you and me! Swing along and sing a nice song.

programme.title: Stick with Mick
programme.desc: Grab your shopping list and come along! Join Mick as he has lots of fun riding the shopping cart through the Supermarket, placing some milk, fresh bread, and a red apple in his shopping basket. Bon Appetit.

programme.title: BabyTV Studios
programme.desc: See your child go back in time and take part in the first flight ever.

programme.title: Charlie & the Alphabet
programme.desc: G the gardener is growing grapes in his garden. Charlie really wants to bring them to the alphabet party - will they grow in time? Come find out.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Join Baby Butterfly and friends as they sing and dance to this classic and very loved nursery rhyme, The Grand Duke of York. Are you ready to sing along.

programme.title: Mini Matinee
programme.desc: Join the loveable animal friends as they visit Japan. Ozo tells his daughter to make paper birds and by the time she's done, he'll be back! Help her prepare origami birds that bring home a surprise.

programme.title: Beep Beep
programme.desc: Roady and Trucky surprise Voom Vam on a cold Winter's day. Instead of being stuck inside all day, the adventurous gang go skating on the frozen lake! But things don't go according to plan...

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Billy and Bam have fun watching the bears make food together. Sometimes things don't go quite as expected but that's part of the fun.

programme.title: Travelers
programme.desc: Harley and Perry are going on a picnic, but chosing the perfect spot proves to be difficult. Falling acorns, ants and even rain won't stop this duo from having the perfect picnic.

programme.title: Walter and Dude
programme.desc: Walter and Dude are looking for an item that you wear when you are ready to go to bed. Is it a teddy bear, a coat or a night lamp? Join them as they discover pyjamas.

programme.title: Olly
programme.desc: Olly, a 3 year old playful monkey, loves to play dress-up along with his toy friends, Kitty, Dolly and Snail. What will he be today? A bus driver? A doctor? Or maybe a dancer.

programme.title: Bug'n'Play to the Rescue
programme.desc: Butterson finds himself in a sticky situation after retrieving a ball from a high branch. Will he be able to get down safely? Come find out.

programme.title: Happy Birthday To You
programme.desc: Make your child a star on BabyTV by creating their very own personalized birthday greeting. Using a digital photo, parents can create a clip for their child which can be viewed online or submitted to BabyTV for the chance of being featured on-air.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Baby butterfly picks roses and meets friends along the way - Hippo, Elephant, Turtle and more. Careful not to sneeze.

programme.title: Cuddlies
programme.desc: Uh Oh is excited as he is packing his suitcase and getting ready to sleep over at Dodo's house. Join Uh Oh as he tosses and turns and has a hard time falling asleep, prompting Dodo to go to Uh Oh's house so that he can easily sleep as well. Good night.

programme.title: Bath Tubbies
programme.desc: Ducky, Ellie and Froggy want to take a bath but it's empty! Cloud comes to fill it up with rain but the water disappears! Come and help find the plug to keep the water in the tub.

programme.title: Jump Out of Bed Sleepy Head
programme.desc: │ Epizoda: 4 │ Let's solve some riddles, play some games and wake up the castle! Jump out of bed everyone.

programme.title: Egg Band
programme.desc: │ Epizoda: 10 │ Can you tickle with your fingers? Clap with your hands or jump with your legs? Come see how it's done.

programme.title: The World is a Wonder
programme.desc: Join Gaya the Fairy as she explores the autumn, arrival, and migration of birds, and the Wagtails - their behavior during the winter, autumn, and summertime.

programme.title: Zeina's Detective Agency
programme.desc: A pencil arrives at Zeina's doorstep, forgetting what it is used for. Using her detective skill and her best friend Roy, Zeina discovers that a pencil is used for flying in space, like a rocket ship... is it.

programme.title: Welcome to the Island
programme.desc: When a caterpillar comes to visit the island, things get a little out of hand as Lily accidentally throws him off her after a fit of laughter. All's well that ends well as the foursome get to see the amazing transformation of the caterpillar into a beautiful butterfly.

programme.title: Teeny and Tiny's Classroom
programme.desc: Let's play the "Matching Game" with Teeny and Tiny! Can you help solve this riddle and tell which item doesn't match.

programme.title: Mike's Bikes
programme.desc: Tommy is having a hard time keeping his balance while riding a bike. After trying some of Mike's quirky ideas, he manages to ride like a pro with training wheels.

programme.title: Stick with Mick
programme.desc: Mick is going to the beach. Join Mick as he sets out to explore the sunny beach and has lots of fun as he builds a sand castle using a bucket and shovel, swims with a swimming ring, licks a yellow popsicle, and enjoys the shade under the colorful parasol.

programme.title: Crafty Rafty
programme.desc: Have lots of fun with paper bags! Create an elegant elephant and merry mouse with paper bags! Enjoy cherry picking with mouse and cat! Yummy! Meet the turkey family and play with cracked egg shells! Join Crafty Rafty as he creates a lovely house from a paper bag! Home sweet home.

programme.title: Billy Bam Bam
programme.desc: Billy and BamBam enjoy eating their soup when it suddenly begins to rain outside. Join them as they pair up socks and use them as make-believe geese dancing, singing and having fun pecking at each other's noses.

programme.title: Jungle Book
programme.desc: It's pineapple day! What does that mean? It's the day the great pineapple ripens and all the animals fest on it together near the lake. But the mischievous Shere-Khan has plans of his own for the great pineapple...

programme.title: Look What I Found
programme.desc: The friends have an amazing time covering themselves up with a blanket! Join the fun as the blanket turns into a terrific tent! Step outside and follow the butterflies! Enjoy a fine picnic eating tasty raspberries before going back home.

programme.title: Maya and Yaya
programme.desc: Maya and Yaya take a long walk and meet a mischievous hedgehog on the way. Maya and Yaya feed him and try to interest the little animal in playing games such as jump rope and ball, but the hedgehog isn't interested. Join the two cute elephants to see what the nice hedgehog really wants! Sleep Tight.

programme.title: Snowies fun and frosty guessing games
programme.desc: Come play a cool guessing game in the snow with the adorable snowies! Guess which animal makes a hissing sound! Is it a bird or a fish? Join the cute snowman friends and have lots of fun as they create a great snake.

programme.title: Egg Band
programme.desc: How do you start your morning? This morning song is sure to get you out of bed in no time. Rise and shine, brush your teeth, and don't forget to eat a yummy breakfast.

programme.title: Pix & Leo
programme.desc: Pix is watering the beautiful flowers to bloom. But when Pix is out of the water, Leo comes to the rescue and fills more from the stream. Oh no! There's a hole in the watering can! How will they water the flowers now.

programme.title: My Robot & I
programme.desc: Kim and Kit build a house from a cardboard box. When they discover Kit is too big to get inside, they try and find creative ways of helping him get in. Come see if they succeed.

programme.title: Ahoy Pirates
programme.desc: │ Epizoda: 1 │ Ahoy everyone! Are you ready for an adventure? Come join Captain Kaite, Jon Jon and Beth as they set sail to find the treasure.

programme.title: Maya and Yaya
programme.desc: Maya and Yaya want to fly like a bird! Join the two cute elephants as they try to fly like a helicopter and jump off rocks but can't seem to fly! What can they do? Come along and see how they learn that there are other wonderful things they can do like running, jumping, and doing cartwheels.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Elephant, Giraffe, Sheep and Baby wash, iron and mend their clothes, sweep and scrub the floor and bake bread. And then they all go round the mulberry bush on a cold and frosty morning.

programme.title: Draco
programme.desc: Join Draco as he learns the difference between high and higher. Draco's big balloon flies away so he jumps high and then higher on a trampoline to catch it. Come laugh, play and have lots of fun with Draco as he enjoys jumping on the trampoline.

programme.title: Let's Dance
programme.desc: │ Epizoda: 4 │ Get off your couch and start to move! Kids will love to dance and move to energetic music while interacting with animated characters. Come join the beat.

programme.title: Kiku at the Home
programme.desc: It's time to relax, slow down and unwind with Kiku. Calming visuals and soft music are great ways to prepare for bed.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Elephant and Baby Butterfly go on an expedition under the sea in a yellow submarine. In the sea they see a frog on a log, Squirrel watering a flowerbed, a shipwrecked pirate ship and more.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Baby Hippo is learning how to walk. On his way he meets a flying butterfly, a jumping frog and a crawling snail.

programme.title: Grandpa Joe's Magical Playground
programme.desc: Join Grandpa Joe and friends to see the surprise they build with magical parts! Connect the hula hoops, rings, fan and parts to create a spaceship! Come along and journey to outer space! Enjoy the planets, stars and shiny moon.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Meet the clever little teapot, short and stout. It has a little handle and spout, and when it sings and whistles, just pour it out.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Join BabyTV in this classic version of The Muffin Man that introduces your little ones to the adorable muffin man delivering baked goods all around town.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: The Tiny Bunch gang are happy, and they know it! Baby, Elephant, Rabbit, Giraffe, Hippo and Turtle all join in to sing and dance "If You're Happy and You Know It"! Come join them.

programme.title: LaLe Ki LoLu
programme.desc: Lale and Lolu have fun in their imaginary circus world int he wintertime. They juggle, ride a unicycle and walk the tight rope.

programme.title: Musical Melody
programme.desc: Join the merry musicians as they play lovely sounds of Romance by Mozart. Step into the breathtaking world of music as you ride in an aeroplane and in colourful hot air balloons and sit on fluffy clouds.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: What a great day for a boat ride on the lake! Baby, Hippo, Rabbit, Elephant, Giraffe and Sheep have fun singing Row Your Boat while actually rowing their boat.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Toto and Robbie fly with their spaceship to wake up a sleepy star so it can shine through the night.

programme.title: Bath Tubbies
programme.desc: Froggy and Ellie have fun in the bathtub blowing a flower and fish out of soap bubbles! Ducky wants to join them but how will he get there? Will he fly a bubble plane or hot air balloon? Come and see the bubbles as they connect to help Ducky join the friends.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Five little monkeys jumping on the bed! Can you guess what happens? One falls off and bumps his head! Somebody call the doctor.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: The Itsy-Bitsy Spider is trying to climb the waterspout, but with no luck. The rain keeps washing it out. Perhaps the sun can help the poor little spider.

programme.title: Good Night Teddy Bear
programme.desc: Teddy is getting ready for bed and tells Mama Bear about the new pair of running shoes that Grandpa bought him! Come along and enjoy the wonderful places he runs to with his fast shoes! See the Great Pyramids of Egypt, the Leaning Tower of Pisa, the Statue of Liberty and Australia too! What a wonderful world.

programme.title: Maya and Yaya
programme.desc: Yaya and Maya are having a wonderful time playing drums using tree trunks. Momo hears the beautiful music from afar and wants to play as well, but doesn't have a drum. Join the two cute elephants to see how their friend Momo finds a way to play the trumpet! Come along and enjoy the band along with the cheering audience of ants.

programme.title: Draco
programme.desc: Join Draco as he learns about opposites by comparing sizes of chairs. One is too short, the other is too tall, but at the end, he receives a suitable chair that is just the right size so that he can reach the table and enjoy his tasty cake.

programme.title: Let's Dance
programme.desc: │ Epizoda: 10 │ Get off your couch and start to move! Kids will love to dance and move to energetic music while interacting with animated characters. Come join the beat.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Black Sheep has really got her friends covered! She knits sweaters for Rabbit, Giraffe and Baby and to keep them extra warm she also makes them a scarf and hat.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Come join all your favorite BabyTV friends as they have fun dancing like babies, ride in hot-air balloons, meet a magician, and have wagon races.

programme.title: Stitches
programme.desc: Needles tries to fly a kite but he just can't make it fly. Bouncy comes along and tries and then Florence joins in the fun but the kite just won't fly. Luckily, Wind makes an appearance and saves the day.

programme.title: Grandpa Joe's Magical Playground
programme.desc: Join Grandpa Joe and friends to see the surprise they build with magical parts! Connect the egg, drums and parts to create a pretty peacock! Come along, enjoy its colourful feathers and dance.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Join Charlie, Lola, Oliver, Hungry Henry, Draco, Billy and Bam Bam as they sing and dance together. Grab a friend or a parent and dance along with them - round and round and up and down.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Playing ball with Draco is fun. When the ball flies over the mountain the bear goes over the mountain to look for it. What will he find.

programme.title: LaLe Ki LoLu
programme.desc: Lale and Lolu explore the magical world of the orient as they cross bridges, sail on boats and fly on a dragon.

programme.title: Musical Melody
programme.desc: Join the musicians as they play beautiful sounds of Violin Sonata by Corelli. Step into the lively world of music as you enjoy the snow and penguins.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: │ Epizoda: 2 │ When we meet somebody everywhere we go, we say hello. Ciao, Konnichi wa, Marhaba - "Hello" has different names - in Italian, Japanese or Arabic. Let's greet our friends from all around the world with a nice hello in their language.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Come sing and dance along with Lola, Charlie, Billy and Bam Bam as they touch their head, nose, chin and arms.

programme.title: Good Night Teddy Bear
programme.desc: Teddy is getting ready for bed! He tells Mama Bear about his adventures with a friendly cloud! Betty Bear and Teddy walk in the park on a hot summer's day! A cloud cools them down by pouring rain! Come along and see how rain fills Daisy Duck's pool and Franky Frog's pond! Come help cloud water the pretty flowers and make them happy again.

programme.title: Bath Tubbies
programme.desc: Froggy is blowing soap bubbles in the bathtub! Who's spraying water on him? Ellie is playing ball and Ducky is sleeping on a mattress! Who could it be? Come along and find out! Join the fun and have a great time splashing and laughing in the tub with all the friends and cloud too.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Baby Butterfly tucks everyone in bed sending them off to a peaceful sleep - Elephant, Draco, Oliver, Charlie and Lola. Good night everyone.

programme.title: Grandpa Joe's Magical Playground
programme.desc: Join Grandpa Joe and friends to see the surprise they build with magical parts! Connect the bench, cymbals and parts to create a colourful car! Fasten your seatbelts and enjoy the wonderful ride.

programme.title: Happy Lights
programme.desc: Soothing music along with images from our surroundings is sure to put your little ones to sleep.

programme.title: LaLe Ki LoLu
programme.desc: Lale and Lolu visit the magical world of ancient Egypt in the winter with it's hieroglyphics, pyramids and colossal statues.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Join Sheep the farmer as he sows and waters the seeds, hoes the weeds and harvests the seeds. Giraffe, Hippo and Rabbit join him in a fun dance.

programme.title: Musical Melody
programme.desc: Join the enthusiastic musicians as they play fine sounds of Pizzicato from Sylvia by Delibes. Step into the splendid world of music as you have fun at the beach with dancing clams, splashing dolphins, sailboats and seagulls.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Five little monkeys jumping on the bed! Can you guess what happens? One falls off and bumps his head! Somebody call the doctor.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Elephant, Giraffe and Rabbit sure know some moves. Join them as they count and dance.

programme.title: Good Night Teddy Bear
programme.desc: Teddy is getting ready for bed and tells Mama Bear about his new friend! Teddy and dad met Panda the penguin at the zoo! Panda was afraid to slide down into the pool! Join them as they take Panda to the amusement park! Enjoy racing in bumper cars, eating candy floss and going on the roller coaster! Join Panda as he overcomes his fear and has fun sliding down the pool at the zoo.

programme.title: Bath Tubbies
programme.desc: Ellie and Ducky are having fun playing with paint! Ellie wants to sleep but is covered with paint splashes! What shall he do? Join Ellie and Ducky as they clean themselves in the bath. Oh no! Ellie still can't sleep, but once Ducky returns, Ellie can finally fall asleep! Good Night.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Billy and Bam play with a balloon. When the balloon flies off the siblings run after it. Will they be able to get their balloon back.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Little Lola has fun staying home playing with her pets. She throws her dog a stick and gives some milk to her cat. Pets are fun.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Toto, Robbie and Dolly are all busy baking a cake! After pouring all the ingredients in the pan Robbie uses his hand as a whip to whip them all up. Come see as they take the cake out of the oven and top it with sprinkles.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Lola has fun with all your favorite characters from the Tiny Bunch. Come join them as they sing the favorite classic "This Old Man".

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Come ride through the town with your favorite BabyTV characters - Baby Butterfly, Elephant, Giraffe, Sheep, Rabit and Squirrel. Riding a bus has never been more fun.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: After a fun filled day of playing outdoors it's always nice to snuggle up in bed with a comfy blanket and pillow. Join your favorite BabyTV characters - Hippo, Giraffe, Rabbit, Squirrel, Butterfly and more as they get ready for bed with this soothing evening song.

programme.title: Songs & Rhymes
programme.desc: Come join the fun as Bambam mischievously tries to frighten Billy as she peacefully eats her curds and whey.

With its lively music, interactive segments, and engaging narratives, "Magic World" is crafted to entertain and educate the youngest audience, providing a safe and enriching environment for kids to discover and enjoy new experiences.

Join Ellie and Ducky as they clean themselves in the bath. Oh no! Ellie still can't sleep, but once Ducky returns, Ellie can finally fall asleep! Good Night.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 5 ││ Epizoda: 7 │ Nadahnut pričom koju je čuo od Carrie, Gumball je smislio plan pomoću kojeg će za Noć vještica na prijevaru dobiti sve slatkiše u gradu. Nevolja je u tome što priča nije samo priča...

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 4 ││ Epizoda: 28 │ Gumball se ponovo susretne s dječakom kojeg je pozdravio da se dokaže Darwinu, no ovaj put nastave se slučajno susretati dok nelagoda ne postane nepodnošljiva.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 4 ││ Epizoda: 29 │ Stanovnici Elmorea počnu nestajati, a jedan je od njih susjed Wattersonovih. Tražeći ga, nalaze neobično jaje koje je snijela njihova zla kornjača. Osjećajući se odgovornima za nevolju, daju se u potragu za odbjeglim ljubimcem.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 4 ││ Epizoda: 30 │ Dok je Tobi zauzet igranjem igrice, Gumball i Darwin odrađuju njegove kućne poslove u zamjenu za bodove - vjerujući da će bodove moći zamijeniti za novac, a novac iskoristiti za igricu. Naravno da ništa ne ide po planu.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 4 ││ Epizoda: 31 │ Dok ih vozi u školu, Rocky predloži djeci da markiraju i odu na izlet. No tek što su krenuli, autobus otimaju kriminalci i uzimaju djecu kao taoce. Samo je Gumballu jasno tko su "kriminalci" zapravo, ali nitko mu ne vjeruje.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 6 ││ Epizoda: 23 │ Gumballov neprijatelj Rob želi se zauvijek riješiti Gumballa, pa ponudi niz raznoraznih televizijskih serija u kojima glavni lik nije Gumball. Na Robovu nesreću, svaka je iduća emisija još gora od prethodne.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 6 ││ Epizoda: 24 │ Pennynoj obitelji se ne sviđa što je Penny izašla iz ljuske - doslovno - a Penny želi da i oni izađu iz ljuske. Budući da se ne mogu dogovoriti, žele da Gumball odluči tko je u pravu, što ga stavlja u vrlo neugodan položaj.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 6 ││ Epizoda: 25 │ U školu dolazi novi klinac, a Gumball i Darwin nađu se u ozbiljnoj nevolji kad se počnu slagati sa svime što predloži jer ga uopće ne razumiju. Nakon niza nesporazuma Gumball i Darwin upadaju u nevolju sa zakonom.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 6 ││ Epizoda: 26 │ Wattersoni odlučuju iznajmiti kuću kako bi preživjeli mjesec, ali potajice i sami ostaju u kući jer nemaju kamo otići. Kad im gosti od šoka padnu u nesvijest, Wattersoni se poboje najgoreg i počnu smišljati kako da prikriju "nezgodu".a.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 6 ││ Epizoda: 27 │ Richard nije navrijeme otvorio vrata, a poštar mu ne želi dati paket iz kombija. Budući da Richard ne želi niti ići na poštu niti platiti novo slanje, između njega i poštara počinje borba koja će ih možda obojicu stajati glave.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 6 ││ Epizoda: 29 │ Svi osim Darwina i Carrie smatraju da će im se veza raspasti zato što su prerazličiti. Kad se pojavi Carrien bivši dečko, koji je isto duh, Gumball shvati da mora natjerati Darwina da vidi što se događa.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 6 ││ Epizoda: 30 │ Anais i Jamie, školska nasilnica, optužene su za isti prekršaj, pa se moraju udružiti kako bi otkrile počinitelja i dokazale svoju nevinost. Kad riješe slučaj, shvate da možda imaju više zajedničkog nešto što su mislile.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 6 ││ Epizoda: 32 │ Tata odluči pomiriti posvađane članove obitelji pomoću čarolije svoje omiljene igre. Hoće li Wattersoni uspjeti zaboraviti na razmirice dok prolaze kroz avanturu života i bore se s magičnim stvorenjima.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 4 ││ Epizoda: 37 │ Yuki Yoshida vraća se u Elmore i izaziva Nicole na dvoboj. Nicole se ne želi boriti s prijateljicom iz djetinjstva koju je davno pobijedila u karatističkom natjecanju, ali popušta kad joj Yuki zaprijeti gubitkom posla i kuće.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 6 ││ Epizoda: 41 │ Darwin želi spasiti predmete koje bešćutni stanovnici Elmorea tlače i iskorištavaju. Odluči pokrenuti revoluciju i navesti predmete da se pobune protiv ljudi.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet

programme.desc: │ Sezona: 2 ││ Epizoda: 4 │ Owen se pretvara da je Izzyin ljubimac dinosaur nakon što je uvjeri da ga je iskopala u školskom dvorištu.

programme.title: Totalna dramarama
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 2 ││ Epizoda: 5 │ U pokušaju da joj uljepšaju dan, Izzy i Owen urede Gweninu stolicu. No kad ona završi u muzeju bijesnih kokoši, moraju je vratiti prije no što Gwen uništi školu u neopisivno mračnom napadu bijesa.

programme.title: Totalna dramarama
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 2 ││ Epizoda: 6 │ Kada se zbog ovisnosti o tehnologiji djeca ulijene, Šef dovodi stručnjakinju kako bi ih vratila u formu.

programme.title: Craig od Potoka
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 2 ││ Epizoda: 28 │ Tragedija zadesi Potok kad Starješine završe ispod Star-kamena, a na Craigu, Kelsey i Johnu je da ih spase.

programme.title: Craig od Potoka
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 2 ││ Epizoda: 29 │ Kad Kelsey razbije zid u Craigovoj kući, otac joj oduzima mač. Ona zato poziva Craiga i Johna da pomognu dokazati njezinu ocu kako je i dalje dostojna mača.

programme.title: Craig od Potoka
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 2 ││ Epizoda: 30 │ Craig pokušava shvatiti kako je započeo drevni rat koji je Potoku donio teške gubitke, u nadi kako će spriječiti da se povijest ponovi.

programme.title: Craig od Potoka
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 2 ││ Epizoda: 32 │ Craig godinama bezuspješno pokušava uvjeriti obitelj da nabave psa, ali možda će uspjeti ako slijedi upute simpatične djevojčice s Potoka i njezin plan u tri koraka.

programme.title: Craig od Potoka
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 2 ││ Epizoda: 34 │ Djeca su u potrazi za neuhvatljivom vreticom na Potoku. Kelsey ujedinjuje svoje prijateljice Moljca i Divljinku kako bi je pronašle, ali brine se da bi se radije družile međusobno nego s njom.

programme.title: Craig od Potoka
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 2 ││ Epizoda: 35 │ Craig i Zeleni Pončo putuju na drugu stranu Potoka gdje Craig saznaje šokantnu priču o porijeklu Zelenog Ponča.

programme.title: Jellystone
programme.desc: Došlo je veselo vrijeme kada snjegovići donose zimu. Ali Augie jednog zadrži kao ljubimca, zbog čega grad zapadne u novo ledeno doba.

programme.title: Mali titani krenite!
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 5 ││ Epizoda: 15 │ Liga pravde održava još jedan talent šou.

programme.title: Mali titani krenite!
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 5 ││ Epizoda: 17 │ Nakon što ga Beast Boy ne pozove na svoj rođendan Robin priređuje vlastitu zabavu s posebnim gostom Bobom Ueckerom.

programme.title: Mali titani krenite!
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 5 ││ Epizoda: 18 │ Robin pokušava ispričati neke legende, no umjesto toga drugi Titani pričaju vlastite sumnjive verzije.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 4 ││ Epizoda: 8 │ Gumball i Darwin primaju ekstravagantnu pozivnicu na Masamin rođendan i zabrinu se da joj neće moći naći prikladan dar. No oni nisu jedini: sva se djeca u Elmoru natječu tko će Masami donijeti bolji rođendanski dar.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 4 ││ Epizoda: 9 │ Ne bi li dokazao da je dovoljno dobar za Penny, Gumball na jedan dan postaje pomoćnik gospodina Fitzgeralda. Kao i obično, Gumballovi entizijastični pokušaji da pomogne čine više štete nego koristi.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 4 ││ Epizoda: 10 │ Gumball, Darwin i Anais oduševljeni su kad im djed Louie daruje ček na velik iznos i odmah počnu fantazirati kako će potrošiti novac.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 4 ││ Epizoda: 11 │ Kad otkriju da Anais trenira za brutalnu borbu, Gumball i Darwin shvaćaju da im sestru gnjavi iritantan dječak: Billy.

programme.title: Totalna dramarama
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 3 ││ Epizoda: 29 │ Šef je očajan kad shvati da njegove strašne šale za Noć vještica nisu nikad nikoga uplašile. Odluči biti uspješniji ove godine, pa organizaciju svega prepušta Gwen. Njezin plan ispadne daleko strašniji nego što je Šef očekivao.

programme.title: Totalna dramarama
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 3 ││ Epizoda: 30 │ Šef je očajan kad shvati da njegove strašne šale za Noć vještica nisu nikad nikoga uplašile. Odluči biti uspješniji ove godine, pa organizaciju svega prepušta Gwen. Njezin plan ispadne daleko strašniji nego što je Šef očekivao.

programme.title: Totalna dramarama
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 3 ││ Epizoda: 27 │ Lovci na zločince moraju se opet ujediniti kako bi spasili Izzy nakon što je Harold otkrio njezin prethodni identitet i time zločinca iz njezine prošlosti doveo ravno do nje.

programme.title: Totalna dramarama
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 3 ││ Epizoda: 28 │ Šef zaboravi lozinku na svom kompjutoru, no zna da ima neke veze s 99 eksplozija koje su se dogodile u vrtiću. Ako unese pogrešnu lozinku, vrtić će eksplodirati i stoti put.

programme.title: Craig od Potoka
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 2 ││ Epizoda: 28 │ Tragedija zadesi Potok kad Starješine završe ispod Star-kamena, a na Craigu, Kelsey i Johnu je da ih spase.

programme.title: Craig od Potoka
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 2 ││ Epizoda: 29 │ Kad Kelsey razbije zid u Craigovoj kući, otac joj oduzima mač. Ona zato poziva Craiga i Johna da pomognu dokazati njezinu ocu kako je i dalje dostojna mača.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 3 ││ Epizoda: 5 │ Djeca konačno dobivaju psića kojeg su oduvijek željeli - samo što je pas zapravo kornjača koja ih mrzi. Kad svi pokušaji da se s njom sprijatelje propadnu, moraju je zaustaviti prije nego što uništi Elmore.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 3 ││ Epizoda: 7 │ Kad Gumball sazna od mame da mu je pravo ime zapravo Zac, preuzima novi, iritantni identitet koji odgovara imenu i počne zaboravljati tko je. Kako ga ne bi izgubili, ostali članovi obitelji daju sve od sebe da ga podsjete na to tko je on.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 3 ││ Epizoda: 8 │ Budući da se Gumballu i Darwinu tog dana ne događa ništa zanimljivo, sporedni likovi koje smo dosad vidjeli samo u pozadini dolaze u prvi plan.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 3 ││ Epizoda: 9 │ Gumball je tako loše raspoložen da svojom mrzovoljom zarazi Darwina. Zato što se neprestano žale, građani Elmora pogrešno shvate da moraju pomoći djeci koja su ostala bez ičega.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 3 ││ Epizoda: 10 │ Na putu na godišnji odmor, Wattersoni pričaju strašne priče kad im se auto pokvari usred pustinje, no stranac koji im priskače u pomoć previše je nalik liku iz jedne od priča.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 3 ││ Epizoda: 11 │ Nakon što Gumball i Darwin otkriju da ravnatelj Brown nema diplomu, ovaj daje sve od sebe ne bi li ih spriječio da odaju njegovu tajnu.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 3 ││ Epizoda: 12 │ Gumball i Darwin shvate da je Molly nestala i da je se nitko ne sjeća. Vjeruje im samo učitelj Small, pa uz njegovu pomoć odlučuju spasiti Molly iz druge dimenzije.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 3 ││ Epizoda: 13 │ Kad gospodin Robinson završi u bolnici, Gumball i Darwin odluče pomiriti ga sa sinom Rockyjem. Kako gospodin Robinson misli da je Rocky razočaranje, dečki Rockyju pomažu naći posao u uredu - ali tvrtka Čaneks nije ono što se čini.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 3 ││ Epizoda: 14 │ Gumball i Darwin rugaju se Claytonu zbog tvrdnje da može neprijatelja dezintegrirati prstom, ali se nađu u nevolji kad se ispostavi da je njegov "posebni napad" doista djelotvoran.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 3 ││ Epizoda: 15 │ Lokalni policajac ostaje šokiran kad otkrije da ni Gumball ni Darwin ne smatraju da je njegov posao zanimljiv. U pokušaju da ih impresionira vodi ih sa sobom na vožnju i malo-pomalo počne kršiti zakon.

programme.title: Gumballov čudesni svijet
programme.desc: │ Sezona: 4 ││ Epizoda: 40 │ Umorni od slušanja Mollynih dugih, napornih anegdota, Gumball i Darwin pokušavaju je naučiti kako da zvuči uzbudljivije.

programme.title: Infiniti Nado
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Pre 15 godina na Zemlju je pao neobičan objekat u kojem se nalazilo 20 Infinity Nado igrača. Oni su osnovali svoj Infinity Nado grad, a priča prati njih četvoro koji sa svojim super moćima čine odličan, nepobediv tim. Uskoro otkriju da nisu svi Infinity Nado igrači dobroćudni i da neki imaju plan da unište planetu Zemlju i čovečanstvo... Naša ekipa to neće dopustiti!

programme.title: Slugtera
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Eli i njegovu ekipa, Pronto, Triksi I Kordo Zejn istražuju pećine, izazivaju rivale kao i jedni druge na prijateljske duele, nadograđuju svoju neobičnu opremu i uživaju u ovom uzbudljivom podzemnom svetu! Ali postoji veoma realna pretnja da Dr Blek pretvori slagove u divlje bezumno oružje! Niko do sada nije bio u stanju da se suprotstavi Blekovim moćnim slagovima i vojsci poslušnika.

programme.title: Spin borci
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Soni, Džoni i Roki su nakon osnovnog testa ušli u sto dvadeset šest igrača koji su se kvalifikovali za turnir Spinfajtersa. Udruženje Spinfajter takmičenja poklanja svakom od njih spiner i pištolj koji su podešeni tako da mogu da postignu vrhunske rezultate. Roki je dobio svog ličnog spinera Sonik Matriksa i pištolj Blek Dragon ali on želi da koristi onaj koji mu je tata poklonio - Flejm Fajtera. Posle prve borbe u kojoj ga Džoni ubedljivo pobeđuje on počinje da sumnja u svoj izbor. Međutim u pomoć mu priskače Doktor Vird i poklanja mu spiner Flejm Storm. Da li će naš mladi i neiskusni Roki uz pomoć novog partnera uspeti da nadjača Džonija? Može li da osvoji turnir u čast svog oca? Čeka ga još mnogo izazova.

programme.title: Tobot
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Dok je radio na rešavanju niza saobraćajnih nezgoda Frenklin Čar biva otet. Ovo aktivira njegove Tobote. Prva dva Tobota su poverena njegovim sinovima Rajanu i Koriju kako bi zaštitili njihov kvart od kriminala.

programme.title: Sonik Bum
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Sonik Bum je popularna Segina video igra na osnovu koje je nastala i istoimena serija u kojoj pratimo Sonikove avanture kroz nepreglednu džunglu u kojima ga prate prijatelji Reponja, Ejmi Rouz, Krcko i Jaza. Planove im često kvari glavni neprijatelj dr Robotnik, poznatiji kao Jajomen, i njegovi roboti i verne sluge Orbot i Kjubot. Ovo je serija koja nije namenjena samo deci nego će u njoj uživati i stariji dok se smeju šalama naših junaka jer pored akcije i avanture ova serija obiluje i dobrim humorom.

programme.title: Spin borci
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Soni, Džoni i Roki su nakon osnovnog testa ušli u sto dvadeset šest igrača koji su se kvalifikovali za turnir Spinfajtersa. Udruženje Spinfajter takmičenja poklanja svakom od njih spiner i pištolj koji su podešeni tako da mogu da postignu vrhunske rezultate. programme.title: Winx
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Radnja je smeštena u čarobni univerzum koji ima nekoliko dimenzija i u kojem žive vile, veštice i druga mitska bića. Glavni lik je vilinska ratnica Blum koja se upisuje u školu za vile Alfiju da bi trenirala i usavršila svoje veštine. Tim vila koji se bori protiv zlikovaca čine Blum, Stela, Flora, Tehna i Mjuza. Najčešći protivnici su im veštice Ajsi, Darsi i Stormi. Pratite avanture naših junakinja od početka njihovog druženja samo na Dexy TV!

programme.title: Super Cuties
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Pridružite se malim slatkim junakinjama u njihovim avanturama! One su hrabre i smele te uvek spremne za novu misiju spasavanja sveta!

programme.title: Pepa prase
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Crtana serija, zasnovana na avanturama Pepe i njenog brata Džordža, njene porodice i prijatelja. Pepa obožava da se igra ali i da skakuće po blatnjavim baricama. Svaka njihova avantura se završava uz glasan smeh...

programme.title: Blui
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Blui je šestogodišnje štene rase Australijskog govedara, pastirskog psa, koga karakteriše obilje energije, mašte i radoznalosti prema svetu. Mlada Blui živi sa svojim ocem Benditom, majkom Čili i mlađom sestrom Bingo, koja joj se pridružuje u svakoj avanturi i beskrajnom maštanju kroz igru. Ovaj svetski poznat serijal obiluje raznovrsnim likovima, predstavnicima različitih rasa pasa, a priče koje se pričaju prepoznaćete i sami jer govore o porodici i o odrastanju.

programme.title: Gabina kuća lutkica
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Gabi je devojčica koja će voleti da podeli svoju radost maštanja i igranja sa vama. Saznaćete vrlo brzo da ona obožava sve što ima veze sa mačkama jer su joj najomiljenije igračke upravo one mačkastične, poput nerazdvojnog prijatelja Pandiše, sićušne Magi Mace iz Mijaukovite bašte vila, Mijaufina koji u svojoj kuhinji uvek spremi neko ukusno iznenađenje, Macarene koja je u isto vreme i mačka i sirena i naučnica, raspevanog i uvek vedrog DJ Macana, šarmantnog vragolana Macova i mnogih drugih! Igra, interakcija, dobri stihovi, muzika i raskoš ideja za uvek nove i uzbudljive avanture, sve to vas čeka u Gabinoj Kući lutkica!

programme.title: Maša i medved
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Naša glavna junakinja je devojčica Maša čiji je najbolji drug nezgrapan i veliki medved koji je čuva, podučava i igra se sa njom. Zajedno prolaze kroz mnoge komične avanture u koje Maša upada zbog svoje znatiželje i razigranosti. Na kraju se uvek sve dobro reši zahvaljujuci smirenosti i snalažljivosti medveda. Pored njih srećemo i ostale stanovnike šume: zeca, ježa, vukove, vevericu i medvedicu.

programme.title: Visoka duga
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Samo oni sa istančanim ukusom za modu mogu da zakorače u čudesni svet kreativne škole za dizajn Rainbow High. Sedam devojčica moraju se suočiti sa izazovima i razvijati svoje talente u ovoj umetničkoj školi.

programme.title: Fili Fantazija
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Fili Fantazija je nas nov serijal o avanturama Rouzi, ždrebice jednoroga koja pohađa Kraljevsku akademiju magije u kraljevstvu Fantazija. Njeni najbolji prijatelji – Bela, Lin, Vil i Sedrik pohadjaju zajedno sa Rouzi školu I uče kako da poboljšaju svoje magijske veštine, bilo da se radi o mešanju čarobnih napitaka ili bacanja čini. Rouzi takođe mora da se nosi sa svakodnevnim školskim životom tinejdžera dok uči o magičnom svetu oko sebe. U podrumu akademije živi Renglum, zlo čarobnjacko drvoliko stvorenje koje je zarobljeno unutar tamnog ogledala nalik kristalnom zatvoru. Betivigs, slepi miš koji je Vilov i Sedrikov kućni ljubimac u studentskom domu, tajno radi za Rengluma kao njegov nespretni sluga. Renglum i Betivigs smišljaju nacine kako da ukradu sve kristale iz akademije da bi mogli da ostvare cilj - vladati Fantazijom.

programme.title: BFF
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Grupa prijatelja tinejdžera koji će kroz različite avanture otkriti da zajedno mogu proći kroz najteže situacije i postati najbolji prijatelji zauvek!

programme.title: Najbolji krzneni prijatelj
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Družina Best Furry Friends čini šest devojčica – Anđelina, Kasandra, Kristina, Fibi, Stefani i Zoi – i njihovih šest krznenih ljubimaca pomoćnika. Svaka od njih se razlikuje po nečemu od ostalih i gaji strast prema nauci, pevanju ili sportu. Kada su zajedno nijedan izazov nije prevelik za njih.

programme.title: Bibin svet
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Glavna junakinja, Bibi, vesela je i mudra devojčica, uvek spremna da pomogne drugima u nevolji. Na putu na kojem proživljava najrazličitija iskustva, ona nikada nije sama budući da joj društvo pravi najbolji prijatelj Bobi. Za razliku od glavne junakinje, Bobi je nestašan i tvrdoglav i često upada u nevolje. U svojim zajedničkim avanturama, Bibi i Bobi susreću se sa raznolikim stvorenjima – džinovima, zmajevima, naišli su čak i na Deda Mraza, a ni zlu vešticu nisu uspeli da zaobiðu. Ti susreti svima su bili od koristi, a značiće i publici da na zanimljivim primerima nauči kako treba održavati higijenu kuće u kojoj živimo, zašto je važno voditi računa o telu i zdravlju, o pravilnoj ishrani, kako i zašto je važno biti skroman i zahvalan, te kako pomoći prijatelju u nevolji. Svojim vernim gledaocima, Bibi i Bobi će pokazati i šta je najvrednije u prijateljstvu, zašto je bitno da čuvamo životnu sredinu i da ne zagađujemo svoje okruženje, a mnoge teme biće opevane sjajnim pesmicama koje pored poučnih stihova, odišu i izuzetno dopadljivim melodijama. Dobro došli ste svi, u Bibin svet!

programme.title: LOL
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Pridružite se Rojal Bi, Lejdi Divi, Neon i Sveg dok se ponovo okupljaju u novoj avanturi koju nikada neće zaboraviti. Rojal Bi kupuje restoran i kuću u kojoj su ona i njene tri najbolje prijateljice provele najlepše dane. Ali to postaje kuća iznenadjenja jer joj je potrebno ozbiljno renoviranje a naše junakinje ne znaju sta ih sve čeka.

programme.title: Posebni ljubimci
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Pridružite se glamuroznim kućnim ljubimcima koji imaju neverovatnu pažnju i negu, na njihovim neobičnim avanturama.

programme.title: Cry Babies
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Slatke male bebe istražuju maštoviti svet u kojem su suze magične i nose posebne moći. Suze pokreću emocije ljubavi ili sreće dok bebe zajedno prevazilaze izazovne situacije.

programme.title: Kokomelon
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Naučite slova, brojeve, zvukove životinja i još mnogo toga u ovoj muzičkoj seriji koja donosi zabavu za celu porodicu uz dečije pesme! Pevajte zajedno sa nama dok učite i zabavljate se!

programme.title: Pinokio
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Pinokio sanja da postane pravi dečak i upušta se u različite avanture! Zajedno sa vernim prijateljima, on je uvek spreman da istražuje svet koji ga okružuje, a najviše prodavnicu svog oca Đepeta.

programme.title: Pirata i Kapetano
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Dok Pirata za kormilom svog broda, Ružičaste lobanje, putuje Velikim morem, njena verna posada prati je u brojnim avanturama. Piratin najbolji prijatelj, Kapetano, upravlja crvenim hidroavionom i pridružuje se nautičkim istraživanjima. Zaplovite sa našim junacima u uzbudljivu potragu za blagom, punu avanture i zabave, naučićete mnogo o vrednostima timskog rada i pravog prijateljstva.

programme.title: Akedo
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Milioni se takmiče ali samo jedan igrač može biti ultimativna Akedo legenda! Džet, Brija i Kab su odlučni da postanu legende u Akedo šampionatu. Daju sve od sebe da poboljšaju svoje veštine kako bi postigli svoj cilj. Na putu ka cilju će im se isprečiti Vord I njegovi igrači koji su jedan od najvećih timova I najjači protivnik u Akedu.

programme.title: Slugtera
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Eli i njegovu ekipa, Pronto, Triksi I Kordo Zejn istražuju pećine, izazivaju rivale kao i jedni druge na prijateljske duele, nadograđuju svoju neobičnu opremu i uživaju u ovom uzbudljivom podzemnom svetu! Ali postoji veoma realna pretnja da Dr Blek pretvori slagove u divlje bezumno oružje! Niko do sada nije bio u stanju da se suprotstavi Blekovim moćnim slagovima i vojsci poslušnika.

programme.title: Tobot Daedo
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Naši voljeni prijatelji, Toboti su se vratili! Zle robotske sile su nestale iz grada Daedo. Toboti više nisu potrebni da bi spasili stvar, i polako postaju obična urbana legenda. Nakon što su mnogi njihovi prijatelji otišli u različite gradove, Rajli, Kori i Dilan su sada učenici petog razreda. Frenklin i Limo zajedno mirno vode mehaničarsku radnju, ali odlučuju da su Toboti još jednom potrebni da zaustave nove zle robote koji su se pojavili u gradu Daedo. Uživajte u novoj, duhovitoj priči sa Tobotom X, Y i Z i njihovim pilotima - Rajlijem, Korijem i Dilanom! Gledajte kako naši prijatelji, Novi Toboti, sarađuju kako bi zaštitili grad Daedo od novih zlikovaca!

programme.title: Gabina kuća lutkica
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Gabi je devojčica koja će voleti da podeli svoju radost maštanja i igranja sa vama. Saznaćete vrlo brzo da ona obožava sve što ima veze sa mačkama jer su joj najomiljenije igračke upravo one mačkastične, poput nerazdvojnog prijatelja Pandiše, sićušne Magi Mace iz Mijaukovite bašte vila, Mijaufina koji u svojoj kuhinji uvek spremi neko ukusno iznenađenje, Macarene koja je u isto vreme i mačka i sirena i naučnica, raspevanog i uvek vedrog DJ Macana, šarmantnog vragolana Macova i mnogih drugih! Igra, interakcija, dobri stihovi, muzika i raskoš ideja za uvek nove i uzbudljive avanture, sve to vas čeka u Gabinoj Kući lutkica!

programme.title: Sonik Bum
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Sonik Bum je popularna Segina video igra na osnovu koje je nastala i istoimena serija u kojoj pratimo Sonikove avanture kroz nepreglednu džunglu u kojima ga prate prijatelji Reponja, Ejmi Rouz, Krcko i Jaza. Planove im često kvari glavni neprijatelj dr Robotnik, poznatiji kao Jajomen, i njegovi roboti i verne sluge Orbot i Kjubot. Ovo je serija koja nije namenjena samo deci nego će u njoj uživati i stariji dok se smeju šalama naših junaka jer pored akcije i avanture ova serija obiluje i dobrim humorom.

programme.title: Infiniti Nado
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Pre 15 godina na Zemlju je pao neobičan objekat u kojem se nalazilo 20 Infinity Nado igrača. Oni su osnovali svoj Infinity Nado grad, a priča prati njih četvoro koji sa svojim super moćima čine odličan, nepobediv tim. Uskoro otkriju da nisu svi Infinity Nado igrači dobroćudni i da neki imaju plan da unište planetu Zemlju i čovečanstvo... Naša ekipa to neće dopustiti!

programme.title: Bejblejd X
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Beyblade X je prva sezona novog serijala, zanimljiva po tome što kombinuje uzbudljive blejderske borbe sa dubljom pričom koja privlači i nešto stariju publiku. Radnja prati Robina Kazamija, mladog blejdera koji, nakon što ga napuste saigrači, udružuje snage sa misterioznim Blejderom X kako bi formirali tim Persona. Zajedno sa Multi Nanairo, internet senzacijom, streme ka cilju da se popnu na vrh X Tornja, mestu na kojem se okupljaju najmoćniji blejderi. Put je dugačak, ali Robin Kazami i njegova ekipa znaju da je stremiti ka pravom cilju najvažnije.

programme.title: Dinoster
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Radnja Dinostera smeštena je u univerzum gde je asteroid promašio Zemlju, i dinosaurusi nikada nisu izumrli. Koristeći visokotehnološka odela i transformišuća vozila, Lucio i članovi njegovog tima istražuju nepoznate predele, spasavaju dinosauruse u nevolji, i bore se protiv misterioznog Beksa Hantera, zlikovca iz njihove stvarnosti, koji je rešen da osvoji ovaj multiverzum.

programme.title: Leo da Vinči
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Serija nam priča priču o uzbudljivim avanturama 15-godišnjeg Leonarda da Vinčija koji dolazi u Firencu, nestrpljivo iščekujući da započne časove crtanja kod maestra Verokija. Porodica Mediči, koja rukovodi gradom, nije mogla da pretpostavi koliko će dragocen biti Leonardov dolazak u Firencu. Leo, koji se stacionirao u svojoj tajnoj laboratoriji ispod grada, uspeva da radi na nesvakidašnjim izumima koje će njegov nerazdvojni prijatelj Lolo uvek nerado testirati. Oni će ipak biti od velike koristi u akcijama koje će Leo i njegovi prijatelji imati u nameri da spasu porodicu Mediči, kod koje su vrlo brzo stekli i poverenje i brojne simpatije. Simpatije se, međutim, rađaju i između Lea i Lise, devojke koja je zaposlena u ergeli Medičijevih. Avanturama glavnih junaka, Lea, Lise i Lola, neretko će se priključivati i Bjanka, ćerka vladara Pjera de Medičija, kome o glavi radi tajanstveni Adolino. On uporno unajmljuje ekipu gusara u nameri da ostvari svoje zle, prevratničke planove. Vođa bande poslušnika je Plavi gusar, a njega verno slede Ajkula, Fransis i Čikala, i ma koliko oni sebe smatrali žestokim momcima, jasno je da su makar jednako toliko i nesposobni, pa njihove akcije neretko završavaju komičnim epilozima. To se Adolinu ni malo ne dopada...

programme.title: Winx
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Radnja je smeštena u čarobni univerzum koji ima nekoliko dimenzija i u kojem žive vile, veštice i druga mitska bića. Glavni lik je vilinska ratnica Blum koja se upisuje u školu za vile Alfiju da bi trenirala i usavršila svoje veštine. Tim vila koji se bori protiv zlikovaca čine Blum, Stela, Flora, Tehna i Mjuza. Najčešći protivnici su im veštice Ajsi, Darsi i Stormi. Pratite avanture naših junakinja od početka njihovog druženja samo na Dexy TV!

programme.title: Tobot Daedo
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Naši voljeni prijatelji, Toboti su se vratili! Zle robotske sile su nestale iz grada Daedo. Toboti više nisu potrebni da bi spasili stvar, i polako postaju obična urbana legenda. Nakon što su mnogi njihovi prijatelji otišli u različite gradove, Rajli, Kori i Dilan su sada učenici petog razreda. Frenklin i Limo zajedno mirno vode mehaničarsku radnju, ali odlučuju da su Toboti još jednom potrebni da zaustave nove zle robote koji su se pojavili u gradu Daedo. Uživajte u novoj, duhovitoj priči sa Tobotom X, Y i Z i njihovim pilotima - Rajlijem, Korijem i Dilanom! Gledajte kako naši prijatelji, Novi Toboti, sarađuju kako bi zaštitili grad Daedo od novih zlikovaca!

programme.title: Pepa prase
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Crtana serija, zasnovana na avanturama Pepe i njenog brata Džordža, njene porodice i prijatelja. Pepa obožava da se igra ali i da skakuće po blatnjavim baricama. Svaka njihova avantura se završava uz glasan smeh...

programme.title: Dinoster
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Radnja Dinostera smeštena je u univerzum gde je asteroid promašio Zemlju, i dinosaurusi nikada nisu izumrli. Koristeći visokotehnološka odela i transformišuća vozila, Lucio i članovi njegovog tima istražuju nepoznate predele, spasavaju dinosauruse u nevolji, i bore se protiv misterioznog Beksa Hantera, zlikovca iz njihove stvarnosti, koji je rešen da osvoji ovaj multiverzum.

programme.title: Bibin svet
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Glavna junakinja, Bibi, vesela je i mudra devojčica, uvek spremna da pomogne drugima u nevolji. Na putu na kojem proživljava najrazličitija iskustva, ona nikada nije sama budući da joj društvo pravi najbolji prijatelj Bobi. Za razliku od glavne junakinje, Bobi je nestašan i tvrdoglav i često upada u nevolje. U svojim zajedničkim avanturama, Bibi i Bobi susreću se sa raznolikim stvorenjima – džinovima, zmajevima, naišli su čak i na Deda Mraza, a ni zlu vešticu nisu uspeli da zaobiðu. Ti susreti svima su bili od koristi, a značiće i publici da na zanimljivim primerima nauči kako treba održavati higijenu kuće u kojoj živimo, zašto je važno voditi računa o telu i zdravlju, o pravilnoj ishrani, kako i zašto je važno biti skroman i zahvalan, te kako pomoći prijatelju u nevolji. Svojim vernim gledaocima, Bibi i Bobi će pokazati i šta je najvrednije u prijateljstvu, zašto je bitno da čuvamo životnu sredinu i da ne zagađujemo svoje okruženje, a mnoge teme biće opevane sjajnim pesmicama koje pored poučnih stihova, odišu i izuzetno dopadljivim melodijama. Dobro došli ste svi, u Bibin svet!

programme.title: LOL
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Pridružite se Rojal Bi, Lejdi Divi, Neon i Sveg dok se ponovo okupljaju u novoj avanturi koju nikada neće zaboraviti. Rojal Bi kupuje restoran i kuću u kojoj su ona i njene tri najbolje prijateljice provele najlepše dane. Ali to postaje kuća iznenadjenja jer joj je potrebno ozbiljno renoviranje a naše junakinje ne znaju sta ih sve čeka.

programme.title: Pinokio
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Pinokio sanja da postane pravi dečak i upušta se u različite avanture! Zajedno sa vernim prijateljima, on je uvek spreman da istražuje svet koji ga okružuje, a najviše prodavnicu svog oca Đepeta.

programme.title: Kokomelon
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Naučite slova, brojeve, zvukove životinja i još mnogo toga u ovoj muzičkoj seriji koja donosi zabavu za celu porodicu uz dečije pesme! Pevajte zajedno sa nama dok učite i zabavljate se!

programme.title: Super Cuties
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Pridružite se malim slatkim junakinjama u njihovim avanturama! One su hrabre i smele te uvek spremne za novu misiju spasavanja sveta!

programme.title: Maša i medved
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Naša glavna junakinja je devojčica Maša čiji je najbolji drug nezgrapan i veliki medved koji je čuva, podučava i igra se sa njom. Zajedno prolaze kroz mnoge komične avanture u koje Maša upada zbog svoje znatiželje i razigranosti. Na kraju se uvek sve dobro reši zahvaljujuci smirenosti i snalažljivosti medveda. Pored njih srećemo i ostale stanovnike šume: zeca, ježa, vukove, vevericu i medvedicu.

programme.title: Bejblejd X
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Beyblade X je prva sezona novog serijala, zanimljiva po tome što kombinuje uzbudljive blejderske borbe sa dubljom pričom koja privlači i nešto stariju publiku. Radnja prati Robina Kazamija, mladog blejdera koji, nakon što ga napuste saigrači, udružuje snage sa misterioznim Blejderom X kako bi formirali tim Persona. programme.title: Najbolji krzneni prijatelj
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Družina Best Furry Friends čini šest devojčica – Anđelina, Kasandra, Kristina, Fibi, Stefani i Zoi – i njihovih šest krznenih ljubimaca pomoćnika. Svaka od njih se razlikuje po nečemu od ostalih i gaji strast prema nauci, pevanju ili sportu. Kada su zajedno nijedan izazov nije prevelik za njih.

programme.title: Visoka duga
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Samo oni sa istančanim ukusom za modu mogu da zakorače u čudesni svet kreativne škole za dizajn Rainbow High. Sedam devojčica moraju se suočiti sa izazovima i razvijati svoje talente u ovoj umetničkoj školi.

programme.title: Akedo
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Milioni se takmiče ali samo jedan igrač može biti ultimativna Akedo legenda! Džet, Brija i Kab su odlučni da postanu legende u Akedo šampionatu. programme.title: Blui
programme.desc: │ Serija │ Blui je šestogodišnje štene rase Australijskog govedara, pastirskog psa, koga karakteriše obilje energije, mašte i radoznalosti prema svetu. Mlada Blui živi sa svojim ocem Benditom, majkom Čili i mlađom sestrom Bingo, koja joj se pridružuje u svakoj avanturi i beskrajnom maštanju kroz igru. Ovaj svetski poznat serijal obiluje raznovrsnim likovima, predstavnicima različitih rasa pasa, a priče koje se pričaju prepoznaćete i sami jer govore o porodici i o odrastanju.

programme.title: Winx
